Description: The following statement contains a magic number: listView = new ListView { RowHeight = 40 };

The following statement contains a magic number: Content = new StackLayout {  				VerticalOptions = LayoutOptions.StartAndExpand'  				Padding = new Thickness(20)'  				Children = {  					nameLabel' nameEntry'   					notesLabel' notesEntry'  					doneLabel' doneEntry'  					//dueDateLabel' dueDatePicker'  					saveButton' deleteButton' cancelButton' speakButton  				}  			};

The following statement contains a magic number: var layout = new StackLayout {  				Padding = new Thickness (20' 0' 0' 0)'  				Orientation = StackOrientation.Horizontal'  				HorizontalOptions = LayoutOptions.StartAndExpand'  				Children = { label' tick }  			};
